name: Battleaxe
description: For the rest of the match, any ATK card you play deals an additional 3 damage. This BUF can only be gained once. If you already have this BUF, ATK for 15 damage.

immediateEffect.script: var existing = PlayerStatuses.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == "Battleaxe Equipped"); if (existing != null) { DealDamage(Opponent, 15); } else { Log(PlayerDisplayName + " equips the Battleaxe!"); }
